data.message:
I seen one of my friends post this their FB page, so I am not sure if ths is TRUE.. Pllease post a message this is true or fake, I just wanted to make sure b4 I copy/paste this message on my FB Page.. Tk U..

"It's official. Signed at 12:20. It even passed on TV. Facebook will start charging this summer. If you copy this to your wall your icon will turn blue and your Facebook will be free for you. Please pass this message, if not your icon will be deleted."

replies.message: Thanks for checking in with us, Rebecca. Our team is aware of this hoax campaign. Be sure not to release any personal or financial information to the sender. When you see stuff like this on Facebook, please report it to us as spam by using these tips from our Help Center: on.fb.me/13fEkz5.  -Rhea
My fb page turn to spanish,I need English, now I'm locked  out. It's saying wrong  pass word. Urgent

7-6-2016 I'm not sure what to do or where i should go, but there is a few people that are saying they are from 'The Facebook Team' they said I won alot of money. I saved all my messages from them. Please contact me 660-591-2103. text me. My name is Lynn Jordan

Hey Lynn, this sound like a hoax message. We recommend that you do not provide any personal or financial information to the sender and report the spam to us by using these tips: http://bit.ly/29i2KGn. Thanks for helping us keep Facebook a safe place! -Jordan
